events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a software developer role. The recruiter will assign your case soon.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to your application and will reach out to schedule the initial screening.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully. You demonstrated strong knowledge relevant to the software engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and providing additional details about your recent projects and experience in software development.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-05 at 14:00 UTC. Please prepare for coding challenges and system design questions.
You completed the technical interview with flying colors, showcasing excellent problem-solving and coding abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-07 at 10:00 UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was completed successfully; you expressed strong alignment with our values and team environment.
We are excited to propose an offer for the software engineer position. Please review the attached compensation and benefits package.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer. Welcome aboard! Our onboarding team will contact you shortly to begin the process.
Your onboarding process has started. We are excited to introduce you to our engineering team and get you set up with all necessary resources.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. You have officially joined the company as a software engineer.
